title: Client Crash after Champion Select
body:
My game just crashed after champion select. I couldn't reload it so I close client it starts repairing some stuff. I load in and it gets remade >.<

Please don't tell me this is an issue with my network/harddrive/PC etc..

This is happening on your side. I am not asking for a refund of the LP, but for you to admit this is a fault on your end and actually start investigating.

Speaking of which, before the loading screen was delayed by 30 seconds or so when there was someone that didn't connect. Why was this removed?

replies.body: GUYS PLEASE HELP ME I HAVE THIS PROBLEM WITH ERROR 183 DUMB FILE PLEASE HELP ME THX !!

I'm having the same problem, after my windows 10 got updated i can't seem to launch into a game on league anymore, i've tried contacting lol support but they keep spitting out the same stock responses which do not help fix anything.

Hey there,

As far as I'm aware there is currently  a known issue causing some players to crash during the loading screen. Read the quoted post from dartagnan below for more info and a potential fix.

>We've been tracking an issue with this patch where players who have the patcher pinned (instead of the desktop shortcut) to their Windows Task Bar consistently crash/Bug Splat when they attempt to get into a game after Champ Select. We are working on a hotfix ASAP, but there is a temporary work around to get this solved:


>1. Un-pin League of Legends from your task bar.
2. Use the patcher's "Repair" tool (click the question mark in the upper right-hand corner).
3. Launch League normally
4. If this still doesn't work, you can also just completely [re-install League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

>We'll update everyone once we get more info about the hotfix!
Done all those fixes, still experience the crash. Thanks for the response anyway, I appreciate it.

So you've already tried reinstalling the game completely?

Are you running the game as Administrator?

Could you try running through the [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
